short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When you view an awesome page, add star count to github repository links.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When you view an awesome page on github site,  such as https://github.com/fffaraz/awesome-cpp, click the extension button, it will add star count to all github repository links on the page.
